name: OhWhoIsDancing
description:
There are at least 30 different characters to choose. Characters have a variety of abilities.
Players can control the abilities of characters at different time points.
The fun of the game comes from creating different ability combinations.
If players record their own voices audio, they can use the game as a storytelling machine.
If players use the game's built-in musics or his own musics with copyright, the game can also be regarded as a music game.
But you don't need to press the keys at some certain moment as other music games asked you to do.
You only need to use the corresponding capabilities at the time which you think it is reasonable.
The system will not give you a score.If you show other players what you've created then other players in the community will give you a score.
This is another fun of the game.
